summary: Adds more salt to food vendors.
descriptionHtml:
There doesn't seem to be enough salt in the game for cooking.

There is a mod that removes the need for salt in cooking, but you should need salt for cooking, so I think its better just to make it more available.

I made it so (nearly) all food vendors (produce vendors do not) now have 3-7 salt for sale up from 1, or in Rorikstead's Inn's case 0.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured_500.png[/img][/url][/center]

Update: Added an optional file for dragonborn, this only adds more salt to The Retching Netch. I would recommend using both files if you have Dragonborn, but they do not depend on each-other. Hearthfire and Dawnguard did not need addons as neither added appropriate food vendors to the game.

This mod is now included in the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11/?]STEP Core Patch[/url], if you use that mod, this mod is not needed.

Fixed the conflict with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]USKP[/url]
author: jimmybob

files.name: More Salt Please - Dragonborn Addon
files.changelogHtml: Merged conflicting changes from USKP, this version contains all the same edits as 1.2, but will not invalidate uskp changes to the same vendors to fix a problem with the master trader perk. This new version works with or without USKP, use only main file

files.name: More Salt Please - USKP Compatibility
files.changelogHtml: Merged conflicting changes from USKP, this version contains all the same edits as 1.2, but will not invalidate uskp changes to the same vendors to fix a problem with the master trader perk. This new version works with or without USKP, use only main file

files.name: Usk compatability Version and dragonborn addon
files.fileName: Usk compatability Version and dragonborn addon-13321-1-4.7z

files.name: More Salt Please
files.changelogHtml:
Rebuilt the mod in CK again, TES5EDIT shows clean, but no changes were made with TES5EDIT
Added back 8 records that were removed in 1.3
Added the PerkMasterTraderGold Litem to all the modified Vendor chests, this will prevent this mod from breaking the fix USKP provides for these vendors and the master trader perk not working for them.
Added the missing PerkMasterTraderGold Litem to 2 additional vendors chest records that were missing them that have yet to be fixed by USKP, this will prevent compatability issues with them when USKP gets around to fixing them as well.
